  • Class
    Description
    AdventureDeck
    Represents a deck of AdventureCards used during the game.
    Dice
    Represents a standard six-sided die.
    FlightBoard
    Represents the flight board used during the space phase of the game.
    FlightBoard.Type
     
    GameModel
    Represents the main model of the game Galaxy Trucker.
    Hit
    Represents an abstract hit on the shipboard, which can be either small or big, and coming from one of the four cardinal directions.
    Hit.Direction
     
    Hit.Type
     
    Material
    Represents a material in the game.
    Material.Type
    Defines the possible types of materials
    Meteor
    Represents a meteor-type hit that can strike the spaceship.
    Planet
    Represents a planet in the game, which can contain materials of various types and can be visited by a player.
    Player
    Rappresenta un giocatore nel gioco, con attributi come username, colore, monete, posizione, e una ShipBoard associata che rappresenta la sua astronave.
    Player.Color
     
    Shot
    Represents a shot that can strike the game board.
